name: Mote
description:
Description:

Mote is a game about exploring game feel underwater. You control "Squiddy", using the triggers to expand/contract and charge a battery. Try to navigate the space and survive as long as you can.

Extra Instructions:

(Game requires a gamepad)

  • Start Button - Pause and View controls
  • R - Restart Game
  • M - Enable/Disable AI
  • Esc. - Close the game
